text: Shafik Bhuchu Batambuze (born 14 June 1994) is a Ugandan international footballer who plays for Gor Mahia in Kenya as a midfielder.AFC Leopards eye Rwandan defender, futaa.com, 3 October 2018 ==Career== Batambuze has played for Simba, Muhoroni Youth, SC Villa, Western Stima, Sofapaka, Tusker and Singida United. He made his international debut in 2016, and was named in the squad for the 2017 Africa Cup of Nations. ==References== Category:1994 births Category:Living people Category:Ugandan footballers Category:Uganda international footballers Category:Simba FC players Category:Muhoroni Youth F.C. players Category:SC Villa players Category:Western Stima F.C. players Category:Sofapaka F.C. players Category:Tusker F.C. players Category:Singida United F.C. players Category:Association football midfielders Category:2017 Africa Cup of Nations players Category:Ugandan expatriate footballers Category:Ugandan expatriate sportspeople in Kenya Category:Expatriate footballers in Kenya Category:Ugandan expatriate sportspeople in Tanzania Category:Expatriate footballers in Tanzania Category:Gor Mahia F.C. players
title: Shafik Batambuze
